title: AI & Data Science Club
caption: Club Website
description: Developed the AI & Data Science Club website using React and Tailwind CSS, showcasing club events, projects, and resources. Integrated Google Analytics for tracking user engagement.
Focused on creating a responsive and user-friendly layout. The site streamlines information sharing and enhances club engagement.
seoDescription: Built the AI & Data Science Club website using React and Tailwind CSS, featuring events, projects, and analytics integration for enhanced engagement.
